trans-unit.source: Determines which predefined path the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener"></xref> class uses to write its log files.
trans-unit.target: 決定的預先定義的路徑<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener"></xref>類別用來寫入記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Assign one of the LogFileLocation enumeration values to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A> property to specify which predefined path the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class uses to write its log files.
trans-unit.target: 將其中一個 LogFileLocation 列舉值，來指派<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A>屬性，以指定的預先定義的路徑<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>類別用來寫入記錄檔。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the path for the application data that is shared among all users.
trans-unit.target: 使用所有使用者之間共用之應用程式資料路徑。

trans-unit.source: If the string specified by <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation*> is not empty, then use it as the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字串<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation*>不是空的則使用它做為路徑。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation*>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use the path for a user's application data.
trans-unit.target: 否則，請使用使用者的應用程式資料路徑。

trans-unit.source: Use the path for the executable file that started the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用啟動應用程式的可執行檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Use the path for a user's application data.
trans-unit.target: 使用使用者的應用程式資料路徑。

trans-unit.source: Use the path of the current system's temporary folder.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前的系統暫存資料夾的路徑。
